item.title: Arizona Leftist Senator Doubles Down On Her ‘Right’ To Tip Off Illegals To ICE Operations
item.description: Liberals, including the state's Dem attorney general, have jumped to Analise Ortiz's defense, but the dangers of her actions are very real.

item.title: Denver Post Doxxes Citizens For Sharing Pictures And Public Records About Crime
item.description: The Denver Post published the names, locations, and employers of three private citizens for sharing public records on social media.

item.title: There Is No Way To Moderate Transgenderism. It Must Be Destroyed
item.description: A New York Times author quietly made a series of admissions that, only a few years ago, would have been dismissed as reactionary bigotry.
